page.title: 05LIFE IN LOUND - SOUTH LINCS
page.content: The hamlet of Lound comprises less than a dozen homes, with only four children. There is no public transport, the nearest bus-route being approx. half a mile away on the A6121 Bourne to Stamford road. Lound has a pillar box, with collections twice daily, except at the weekend,when there is one on Saturday and none on Sunday.There is a daily postal delivery, but no telephone kiosk.South Lincolnshire County Library Service calls once a fortnight. Lound has three street lamps, mains drainage, electricity but no mains gas.
